import './Sidebar.css'; import { BsHouse, BsExclamationCircle, BsImage, BsHeart, BsGithub, BsInstagram, BsFacebook, BsWhatsapp } from 'react-icons/bs'; import { IconContext } from 'react-icons'; import useButtonSide from '../../store/index'; import { useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; const Sidebar = ({ NavLink }) => { const getButton = useButtonSide((state) => state.status); const asideRef = useRef(); getButton ? asideRef.current.classList.add('active') : asideRef.current.classList.remove('active'); return ( <>
) } export default Sidebar;
